data_description.devices: Please select all devices, which you want to use in HA.

data_description.continent: The two letter continent code. Ex.: ww, eu. If your country code is not working try ww
data_description.country: The two letter country code. Ex.: us, uk

user_advanced.description: Please select "Bumper" ONLY if you already have a working bumper instance. Otherwise, select "Cloud" please.

deprecated_integration_issue.description:
I migrated the custom component `Deebot 4 Home Assistant` to the core and merged it with the existing `Ecovacs` integration.

The custom component is no longer needed and will be archived in the future.

Everything was migrated except:
- The events `cleaning_job` and `custom_command`.
- The last cleaning and stats type sensors
- Deprecated services

Migration steps:
1: Remove all `Deebot 4 Home Assistant` config entries
2: Uninstall `Deebot 4 Home Assistant` via HACS
3: Setup the [Ecovacs integration]({docs_url}) by clicking [here]({config_url})
deprecated_integration_issue.title: Time to migrate!

confirm.description:
The service `deebot.refresh` is deprecated and will be removed.
To refresh an entity please use `homeassistant.update_entity` on the respective entity instead.

Please remove this service from your automations and scripts and select **submit** to close this issue.
confirm.title: Deebot refresh service is being removed

deprecated_service_refresh.title: Deebot refresh service is being removed
